TopicTitle: Game crashes every 2nd or third load

Articles.Content:
Every second or third time i launch a ship or reload, it gives me this:

Unity Player [version: Unity 4.5.5f1_7684ad0c5a44]

mono.dll caused an Access Violation (0xc0000005)
  in module mono.dll at 0023:1011926a.


Error occurred at 2015-01-29_155120.
C:\Users\Iceman\Pictures\ksp-win-0-90-0\KSP_win\KSP.exe, run by Iceman.
68% memory in use.
0 MB physical memory [3818 MB free].
0 MB paging file [0 MB free].
0 MB user address space [105 MB free].
Write to location 02000000 caused an access violation.


Context:
EDI:    0x01000000  ESI: 0x9fa7a210  EAX:   0x00040000
EBX:    0x9f0dda90  ECX: 0x02000000  EDX:   0x00000000
EIP:    0x1011926a  EBP: 0x002c9ea4  SegCs: 0x00000023
EFlags: 0x00010206  ESP: 0x002c9e80  SegSs: 0x0000002b


Bytes at CS:EIP:
66 0f 7f 01 66 0f 7f 41 10 66 0f 7f 41 20 66 0f


I'm playing with hyperedit, kerbpaint, and kerbalengineer - it seems like it's gotten worse lately, even though I've been using these for a long while now. Is it because my save file has a lot of ships in it?
no one is going to help me?
Weird indeed. Try adding page file, your system has none. Google it if you don't know how.

it seems like it's gotten worse lately

Do you mean by lately since the upgrade to 0.90?

The reason i ask, is because a lot of new parts got added.

Are these all the mods you have installed?

Do you have ATM installed?

NOTE: First run after installing ATM may take up to an hour, with a lot of mods installed.

Do you mean by lately since the upgrade to 0.90?

The reason i ask, is because a lot of new parts got added.

Are these all the mods you have installed?

Do you have ATM installed?

NOTE: First run after installing ATM may take up to an hour, with a lot of mods installed.

I have Kerbpaint, Kerbal Engineer, Hyperedit. That's it.

It gets worse as my save files get bigger, it seems, regardless of version. This started happening later in .25 as I had more and more ships.
